attributes.additional_details:
By having this database, it puts responsibility on the passenger to behave and conduct themself in an approapriate manner because if they fail, there is a consequence which can affect their future travel plans. 

This measure would offer reassurance and safeguards to fellow passengers and in-flight crew, knowing that those who fail to control their behaviour will be effectively banned from booking flights for a pre-determined period.
attributes.background: In recent months, there has been an increase in media stories in respect of people engaging in anti-social and drunken behaviour on board flights to and from the UK. A National Database should be be introduced so that those convicted are added, and not permitted to book flights in the future.
